directions: In a saucepan, combine apricots, brown sugar, raisins and water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to simmer and stir while simmering for 5 minutes. Stir in cranberries, apple and lemon zest; simmer for 10 minutes more.
Stir lemon juice, ginger and pepper flakes into the mixture before removing from heat. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: ¼ cup dried apricots, finely chopped
1  Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and chopped
title: Spicy Cranberry Chutney
